description.string:
Method for prediction of traveltime and longitudinal dispersion in rivers and streams using Jobsons equations,
 See Jobson, H.E., 1996, Prediction of Traveltime andLongitudinal Dispersion in Rivers and Streams: U.S. Geological Survey Water-Resources Investigations Report 96-4013
Lists the data required to run execute time of travel method
Executes time of travel method given the configuration
Executes time of travel method given the configuration (alternative method)
